attributes.action: correct the environment of the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are disgusted with the propensity of the UK to litter the landscape of the UK with trash. We speak specifically toward the mess that is becoming a sore on Scotland. All of the railway tracks and many of the main motorways are a travesty in what should otherwise be a "green" area.  In Canada and in the US there are STEEP fines against litter along any rail track or motorway.  let's also implement voluntary days that would allow clean-up of these areas!  Much of our income is dependent on tourism; shame on us for allowing americans to report that we have become a trash civilization!  Let's CLEAN IT UP!
